Sentencas: The present work aims to better understand the effect of operating temperature on the degradation of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells (SOECs).
Titulo: Effect of the operating temperature on the degradation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The studied SOECs consist of La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta-Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta (LSCF-GDC) oxygen electrode, GDC diffusion barrier layer, Y0.16Zr0.84O1.92 (YSZ) electrolyte and Ni-YSZ hydrogen electrode.
Titulo: Effect of the operating temperature on the degradation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: Durability tests are carried out at 750, 800 and 850 degrees C for 2000 h at -1
Titulo: Effect of the operating temperature on the degradation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: A cm-2, using 10/90 vol% H2/H2O and dry air at the hydrogen and oxygen electrodes, respectively.
Titulo: Effect of the operating temperature on the degradation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical impedance spectra measured before and after ageing reveal a strong evolution related to the hydrogen electrode, while the change in the oxygen electrode contribution remains negligible.
Titulo: Effect of the operating temperature on the degradation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: A set of advanced characterization techniques are employed to study the cell degradation.
Titulo: Effect of the operating temperature on the degradation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: For the hydrogen electrode, a large Ni depletion is observed after ageing, which increases with the operating temperature.
Titulo: Effect of the operating temperature on the degradation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The analysis of the oxygen electrode shows an elemental interdiffusion between the LSCF-GDC/GDC/YSZ layers on the manufactured cells that seems to not evolve significantly upon operation.
Titulo: Effect of the operating temperature on the degradation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the presence of SrZrO3 is not detected in the pristine cell and in the operated ones.
Titulo: Effect of the operating temperature on the degradation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: Besides, only a limited LSCF decomposition is found in good agreement with the electrochemical characterizations.
Titulo: Effect of the operating temperature on the degradation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: Hypotheses that could explain the good oxygen electrode stability are discussed.
Titulo: Effect of the operating temperature on the degradation of solid oxide electrolysis cells
